message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can we meet in the middle somewhere?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I understand your budget constraints, $12,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet at $17,000? This feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $17,000 is still too high for me. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. That's the highest I can go.
